reviewText: I bought this video to aid in learning to play the fiddle, and I must say that the music Craig Duncan was playing on his fiddle was so beautiful, and he is backed up by a guy who accompanies on the guitar. In fact, my mom loved it so much that she borrowed it from me. Craig does interrupt between songs to say what page of the book he is on and what song it is, but it is such a great video. I'm not sure how it will do in aiding in my fiddle playing, but I'm glad I bought it; and oh yeah, so is my mom!!!
